title: From stolen bicycle to big biz: How a humble man built a bank from scratch
description: Chandra Shekhar Ghosh, founder of Bandhan Bank, transitioned from CEO to a strategic role after starting as an NGO and growing it into India's largest microfinance institution turned universal bank. Overcoming his humble beginnings, Ghosh's journey inspires entrepreneurs as he reshapes the banking landscape with his dedication and innovative vision.
